Spruce Creek by Del Webb | Summerfield 55+ Homes | 2025 MLS Home About Us – Best Realtor in Ocala Homes For Sale 352-362-3418 Toggle navigation Buying Selling Browse By Location Local Resources Search Homes Estimate Home Value Spruce Creek by Del Webb | Summerfield 55+ Homes Browse By 55+ Browse By 55+ « Ocala HOA Fees Chart Candler Hills Cherrywood Estates Cherrywood Preserve Falls of Ocala Hardwood Trails Indigo East JB Ranch Liberty Village Marco Polo Marion Landing Oak Run Ocala Palms Ocala Preserve On Top of the World Quail Meadow Palm Cay Pine Run Estates Spruce Creek North Stone Creek Stonecrest Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club Summerglen Spruce Creek South Weybourne Landing See More Del Webb Spruce Creek community is a beautiful gated adult living community in Summerfield, FL . It’s close to nearby shopping, just minutes from The Villages, FL. Many doctors, restaurants, the Market of Marion flea market, and so much more are nearby. In addition to being gated, Spruce Creek has a guard at both entrances for added security. Also, a clubhouse with amenities like a workout room, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, pickleball, and a fantastic golf course. Spruce Creek also features its restaurant, Toppers Tavern, so you won’t have to leave the community if you don’t want to. You’ll notice the community’s beauty from the time you pull and see the gorgeous fountain at the entrance. While driving through the community, you’ll appreciate the well-manicured roads and landscaping. Pride of ownership shines throughout the community; with all the activities, you can easily make new friends! Enjoy browsing all homes for sale in the beautiful 55+ Del Webb Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club in Summerfield, FL. Contact us when you find one you’d like via text or phone at 352-362-3418. If you have a home to sell, use our home value estimator for a personal valuation. Del Webb Spruce Creek HOA Fees include clubhouse access, fitness center, indoor pool, trash pickup, gates, guards, and common area maintenance.
